summary: The Rock and Roll Hall of Fame, or Rock Hall, is a museum in Cleveland, Ohio, that celebrates rock music history. It honors artists, producers, and other music influencers. The idea for the Hall of Fame was started by Ahmet Ertegun in 1983. After looking at many cities, Cleveland was chosen as the home in 1986. The museum, designed by architect I. M. Pei, opened in 1995 on the shore of Lake Erie.
title: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame
